entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -26.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
